description: This is a localized React app.
headline_overlay: Your trusted transport in Zadar and beyond
subtext_overlay: Get to your destination quickly and safely with our professional drivers and modern fleet. Book a ride in seconds!
card_1_text: Our drivers arrive within minutes of your booking. No more waiting in the rain or cold.
card_2_text: All our drivers are licensed professionals with years of experience and clean records.
card_3_text: Transparent pricing with no hidden costs.
card_4_text: Choose from our range of clean, comfortable, and well-maintained vehicles.
card_5_text: Our customer service team is available around the clock to assist you.
review_1_text: Taxi Diadora has been my go-to for transportation for over a year now. The drivers are always professional and their cars are clean. I've never had to wait more than 5 minutes for a pickup!
review_2_text: As a business traveler, I need reliable transportation. Diadora Taxi's corporate account service has saved me so much time and hassle. Their drivers know the city inside out!
review_3_text: I used Diadora Taxi for my wedding day transportation and they exceeded all expectations. The premium sedans were immaculate and our guests were all picked up on time.
footer_description: Book taxi transport from the comfort of your home. With one click, you can book a taxi ride or transfer at great prices. Our vehicle and driver will meet you at your desired location.
footer_copyright: Â© 2025 TAXI DIADORA. All Rights Reserved.
book_now_text: Need a ride? Fill out the form and one of ours drivers will pick you up in minutes. We operate 24/7, 365 days a year.
booking_successful: Thank you! Your request has been sent.
validation_error: Please fill out the form, all fields are required!
